Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Loosely \Loose"ly\, adv. In a loose manner. [1913 Webster]

loosely adv 1: in a relaxed manner; not rigid; "his hands lay loosely" [syn: {slackly}] 2: in a loose manner; "a union of loosely federated states" 3: without regard to specific details or exceptions; "he interprets the law broadly" [syn: {broadly}, {broadly speaking}, {generally}] [ant: {narrowly}] 4: knitted in a loose manner; "loosely knit"
